p: Inspection of model associated EOsâ€™ chemical components importance, the Skater algorithm indicated 3-octanol, phellandral, thymol and d-limonene as those mostly influencing biofilm production inhibition ( Figure 8 and Table 7), whose positive control was highlighted by means of partial dependence plots which describe the marginal impact of a feature on model prediction ( Supplementary Material Figure SM-2).
